column5: Fully furnished 1 bedroom apartment in North Dallas with cable and internet (AT&T U-verse), full kitchen, washer/dryer, closet space, and memory foam bed.  Community has a pool and 24-hour gym.  Close to 2 highways (75 and 635), multiple parks, a Kroger (across the street), a Walmart (2-minute drive), many restaurants, dry-cleaning (across the street), with public transportation nearby (Dallas Rail).   15 minutes to Downtown Dallas, 20 minutes to Korea-town.
